title: Produce Flame
content:
Produce Flame Conjuration Cantrip A flame in your hand sheds a light in a 9m radius and deals 1~8 Fire damage damage when thrown. Throwing the flame immediately after you conjure it does not cost an action. Extinguishing or throwing it on subsequent turns costs an action. Until Long Rest Action

Conjuration Cantrip

A flame in your hand sheds a light in a 9m radius and deals 1~8 Fire damage damage when thrown.

Throwing the flame immediately after you conjure it does not cost an action. Extingui
